name.baseName: Printing ; Carpet, tapestry ; Oil ink ; Hot soft printing ; All sizes; NESPS2
印刷① ; 地毯、挂毯 ; 油墨 ; 热软印 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集代表了一种工业印刷过程，具体是使用油墨在地毯和挂毯上进行热软印刷。这一过程可以应用于各种尺寸的装饰性纺织品的生产。此外，还涉及了处理废气和挥发性有机化合物(VOCs)的各种污染控制技术的有效性，例如光催化，活性炭吸附，光解和低温等离子处理。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码24,四级代码2437文件，在完整版文件中第2847页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为油墨，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisPhotocatalysis + activated carbon adsorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是光催化+活性炭吸附，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/废气产污核算环节正常生产时间（小时/年），2434花画工艺品、2439其他工艺美术及礼仪用品的生产过程中，如果包含印刷工艺，废气指标根据所使用的油墨类别（溶剂型油墨、水性油墨两种）和承印物种类参考231印刷行业印刷核算环节的系数手册。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisActivated carbon adsorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = normal operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (days/year) / number of days of pressing (days/year)

污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是活性炭吸附，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/废气产污核算环节正常生产时间（小时/年），2434花画工艺品、2439其他工艺美术及礼仪用品的生产过程中，如果包含印刷工艺，废气指标根据所使用的油墨类别（溶剂型油墨、水性油墨两种）和承印物种类参考231印刷行业印刷核算环节的系数手册。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisLow temperature plasma，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management55，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = normal operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (days/year) / number of days of pressing (days/year)
